org.apache.cocoon.environment.wrapper
Class ResponseWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.cocoon.environment.impl.AbstractResponse
      org.apache.cocoon.environment.wrapper.ResponseWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpServletResponse, org.apache.cocoon.environment.Response, ServletResponse
public class ResponseWrapper
extends org.apache.cocoon.environment.impl.AbstractResponse
implements org.apache.cocoon.environment.Response

This is a wrapper class for the Response object. It contains the same properties as the wrapped instance but swallows calls that would modify response headers.
